name: Dawn Of The Droids
description:
This short story is about Hera (resistance pilot) who is intercepted by the Empire during an escape. But the real problems start when something strange causes the droids to turn into killers. Take on the role of Hera and a surviving Imperial Army Trooper.

The project has one big problem, every level at the end exit from the game! 

So you have to restart every time.
